localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Fluently is an online distraction-free editor with a translator, multilingual grammar checker, and synonym library built-in. Improve your writing in a foreign language.
blogPost.body: Fluently is an online distraction-free editor with a translator, multilingual grammar checker, and synonym library built-in. Improve your writing in a foreign language.
blogPost.title: Fluently - Write fluently in any language
blogPost.author: Milber Ferreira

localize.description: Fluentlyは、翻訳機、多言語文法チェッカー、同義語ライブラリを内蔵した、気が散らないオンラインエディタです。外国語で書かれた文章を上達させましょう。
localize.tagline: どの言語でも流暢に書ける

localize.description: Fluently是一个在线无干扰编辑器，内置翻译器、多语言语法检查器和同义词库。提高你的外语写作水平。
localize.tagline: 用任何语言流利地写作

localize.description: Fluently是一個在線無干擾編輯器，內置翻譯器、多語言語法檢查器和同義詞庫。提高你的外語寫作水平。
localize.tagline: 用任何語言流利地寫作

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US are now at their lowest levels since the start of the pandemic. 🙏 https://t.co/QuQYK9L4YO

localize.full_text: 米国でのコヴィド-19による入院は、パンデミック開始以来の最低レベルに。🙏 https://t.co/QuQYK9L4YO
美国的Covid-19住院人数目前处于该大流行病开始以来的最低水平。🙏https://t.co/QuQYK9L4YO
美國的Covid-19住院人數目前處於該大流行病開始以來的最低水平。🙏https://t.co/QuQYK9L4YO

next.excerpt: Bloggi is a simple blogging platform that lets you focus on writing and takes care of everything else for you.

localize.description: Bloggiは、文章を書くことに集中できるシンプルなブログプラットフォームで、その他のことはすべてあなたに代わって行います。
localize.tagline: 自分のブログを数秒で作成

localize.description: Bloggi是一个简单的博客平台，让你专注于写作，并为你打理其他一切。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内创建你自己的博客

localize.description: Bloggi是一個簡單的博客平臺，讓你專注於寫作，併爲你打理其他一切。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建你自己的博客
